results.title: Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature
results.text_hl: Plasma @CHEMICAL_Sterols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013261 @@@sterol@@@ analysis and exome sequencing confirmed the diagnosis of @DISEASE_Lathosterolosis @DISEASE_MESH:C537880 @@@lathosterolosis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment resulted in lowering of plasma @CHEMICAL_lathosterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C001521 @@@lathosterol@@@ levels, improvement in transaminitis, and @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@ grade, suggesting that children with this condition should be actively treated in order to prevent progression of @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@liver disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Yaplito-Lee J, Pai G, Hardikar W, Hong KM, Pitt J, Marum J, Amor DJ. Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature JIMD Rep. 2020 Nov;56(1):14-19. PMID: 33204591

results.title: Optimization of Statin-Loaded Delivery Nanoparticles for Treating Chronic Liver Diseases by Targeting Liver Sinusoidal Endothelial Cells.
results.text_hl: In this study, we developed functionalized polymeric micelles (FPMs) loaded with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (FPM-Sim) as a drug delivery system to target liver sinusoidal endothelial cells (LSECs) for preserving liver function in @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@chronic liver disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Liver_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@CLD@@@).

results.title: Improved anti-fibrotic effects by combined treatments of simvastatin and NS-398 in experimental liver fibrosis models
results.text_hl: This value increased to 8.44% after combined treatment with 5 muM @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and 50 muM @CHEMICAL_N_(2_cyclohexyloxy_4_nitrophenyl)methanesulfonamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C080955 @@@NS-398@@@ a nd was highest at 27.3% after combination treatment with 10 muM @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and 50 muM @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
